=======
CHANGES
=======

0.5.1 (2012-12-10)
------------------

- switch to elasticsearch 0.20.0

- added version argument to startElasticSearchServer

- cleanup imports


0.5.0 (2012-11-18)
------------------

- initial release tested on win 32bit and posix 32bit. NOT tested on win 64bit,
  posix 64bit and mac 32/64bit systems.
